item.description: I don‚Äôt know what your rush hour traffic is like, but we just had 15 sheep (regular sheep, not Heidschnucken) herded down our cobblestone street (by people, not dogs)

item.description:
Thunderstorm rolling through and the temp just dropped by 5¬∞C https://t.co/UGLwEzbyXp

Pardon me, has now dropped 15¬∞C https://t.co/FUek557rU0

Our neighbor reported her 5 minute commute from work took 45 minutes because 5 routes she tried were blocked by fallen trees. She ended up taking a trail along a farmer‚Äôs field to get home.

We‚Äôre still hearing sirens from civil defense and fire trucks 90 minutes after the storm was over

item.description: @Regensbloggerin I get (very rarely) 3 kinds of spam calls: fake Microsoft, fake Europol, and Democrats Abroad üòõ

item.description: Tried to get a second booster today, but was turned away as my positive PCR test was just 3 months ago. I‚Äôm to wait another 3 months. I did get a stamp in my vax book (and a QR code) for the positive test.
item.source:markdown: Tried to get a second booster today, but was turned away as my positive PCR test was just 3 months ago. I‚Äôm to wait another 3 months. I did get a stamp in my vax book (and a QR code) for the positive test.
